item.title: Hard Tacos vs. Soft Tacos
item.description: Why Not Both? A little girl once said “porque no los dos”. With these legendary words, she broke the universal misconception that we as humans must choose between two good things; that we are eternally damned to giving up one thing in order to have the other. Hard tacos vs soft tacos… With that phrase that will be immortally etched into the fabric of time, we no longer have to choose between hard tacos and soft tacos.
